projects.title: InterviewPrime – AI-Powered Mock Interview System
projects.description: Architected an AI-driven platform for mock interviews and English coaching with real-time voice interaction and instant AI feedback. Integrated Deepgram (STT/TTS) and Gemini via OpenRouter to enable interactive conversational simulations. Built credit-based usage & history tracking to boost engagement and deliver a seamless, app-like experience.

projects.title: EduCore – EdTech Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description: Developed a scalable LMS platform for course creation, progress tracking, and student engagement with secure JWT access. Integrated Cloudinary for optimized media handling and built a modular course structure for flexible content delivery. Delivered a responsive, production-ready UI.
